content.detailedDescription: On sunday october 11, 2015 it was a beautiful, warm, cloudless day. i went for a bike ride with my brother. we went to the douglas trail which starts in rochester, mn and ends in pine island, mn. 13 miles each way. at about 10 mile in we were being followed by a large brown hawk. this hawk was acting crazy and would not leave us alone. we finally stopped and the hawk hovered about 30 feet above us. he was catching the wind and was staring at us. we thought he was going to attack us. i have never seen or heard of a hawk doing this sort of behavior. we did nothing to provoke him. after about 30 seconds he flew off. we kept our eye on him until he was a distance away. we were just about to start our ride again when i looked up above the hawk in the distance and saw a white orb. the orb was way up high. it was a total cloudless day so it was the only thing in the entire sky. i looked at it for about 10 seconds then it started to grow in size. it changed it's shape and became a large triangle craft. it was transparent but the sunlight reflected off it. it looked like glass. with the sunlight you could see it's depth and it's dimensions. then it shot across the entire sky at an insane speed. it went from the western horizon to the eastern horizon in 1 second flat. a vast distance. it had to be traveling at thousands of miles per hour. it then stopped instantly. i yelled at my brother to look up. he saw it when it stopped and reached for his phone to take a picture. the object then blinked and shrank until it was gone. there was no time to get a picture. from the time it grew and went across the sky to the time it stopped and disappeared was only about 5 seconds. there was not enough reaction time to get a picture. after the sighting we continued our bike ride and witnessed no more actively.
content.summary: Large morphing transparent triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: I was at deer camp.I though it was a feather falling from the sky but looking again it was not. the ship came start down no sound at all.I knew what i was looking at and it blew me away. i was so inall i did not think to grab my camera.About 500 feet it stop and moved ne untell i could not see it any more but two black jets with very little wings came over and they were getting it on in persuite.The jets were going faster than the space ship, i do not knew if they caught up with ship.
content.summary: Disc shape with small dome on top, bottom about half of the ship had a spinning round wheel ,a foot high. anti gravity

content.detailedDescription:
This incident took place in the fall of 1996. i don't know the exact date, but i remember the harvest moon was in the sky. i was 19 years old at the time. 
at around 2:30 in the morning a friend called and invited me out to his house. we worked together on evening shift so it was a normal time for us to get together. i lived in a small town called williamstown at the time, and he lived in a town called waverly, about ten miles away across a sparsely populated state route. this state route, 31, has a break in it where route 2 intersects with it. in order to get to my friends house, i had to drive to the end of the first section of 31, turn onto route 2, and after about 20-30 feet, take a left and continue on the other side of route 31.
it was at this intersection that the sighting took place. 

at around 3 a.M., i arrived at the stop sign at the intersection of route 31 and route 2. i pulled onto route 2, and into the turning lane to continue on to the second half of route 31. when i slowed in the short turning lane, directly ahead of me about 100 ft away, and around 20 degrees in the sky, was a very large, black, rectangular object. i brought my car to a stop, and rolled down my window, to get a clear look as my windshield was dirty. there were no lights on this object, and it generated no sound that i could hear at my proximity. it was illuminated only slightly by a few streetlights on the street below and the bright harvest moon. this gave me a very vague outline of the object. it was completely motionless. the body of the object was totally black, besides the outline of the thing, the only way i could discern its mass was its obstruction of the stars behind it. i observed it in this state for approximately 30 seconds, before what i can only describe as a green ball of fire ejected from the western side of the object, which rapidly descended in a diagonal path into the wooded area on the opposite side of route 2, a few hundred feet behind a small trailer park. 

unfortunately at this point i became extremely frightened and drove as fast as i could to my friend's house. i ran to his door and immediately told him what i had just seen. he said that he has seen dancing lights in the area once before and demanded i show him where it was. i agreed reluctantly, and we took his car to the location. the object was gone, the time between my exit from the area and our return was approximately ten minutes. 
we drove around the area, which consists mostly of gravel country roads, thick wooded areas, and small valleys for the next hour or so. about 10-20 minutes after we began our search on these roads, the sky became busy with helicopter and small airplane activity. we saw nothing else of note that night, and i have never encountered anything like this again.
there is both a local national guard and a small commercial airport located on route 31, about 5 miles away from where the incident occurred.
i have never been able to explain this occurrence, my father, who worked at the national guard at the time, told me it was most likely night maneuvers, and a helicopter from the base had simply fired a flare. 

however, i cannot accept that explanation, because the object was clearly not a helicopter. i have never reported this incident other than to my parents at the time, and some of my friends. the reason i finally reported it was because i came across the story of the phoenix lights, and some of the details reminded me of my encounter, and i hoped to see if anyone else in the area might have seen it as well, as there were no other cars on the road at the time but there was some sparse  housing.
content.summary: Large, black, hovering rectangular object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i was home after final exams june 13 (not sure of day) 1969, it was only a half-day. not sure exactly what time i came home but i'll say definitely close to 12 noon - 1 p.M. still in school clothes, i went to our back yard and looked into the sky, i don't know why but why not? that's when my eyes were drawn up and there it was. 

i was surprised that it wasn't saucer-shaped craft but definitely strange looking. i knew it was a craft pretty quick... i just had a feeling, like stripping away the logistics of what we see in the air, this didn't fit into that frame, plus generating its own force-field to stay in one position without moving and no, it was not a helicopter.

i was disappointed b/c it was shaped like a barrel. silver/gray metallic, heavy looking, just hanging in the sky without moving...At all. the top & bottom were cylindrical and the widest point in the center, was a little wider than an actual barrel. it was too far away to hear anything, on the other hand, it gave me a weird feeling. 

probably b/c i'd never seen anything like it & it was a little creepy b/c my mind was decompressing from school and it was noonday, still in school clothes, the last thing i'd expect to see was a ufo if that's what it was but by virtue of the fact that this "craft" was in mid air, not moving, intuitively, one ascertains that there's something unusual and i felt it. nothing "from" the craft like radiation, just the feeling that this is an anomaly, unusual and witnessing this event is something you won't forget.

who on a beautiful, sunny june day would concoct a ufo story after exams? 

i watched for a good 20 minutes and nothing happened. i went back inside for lunch and turned on my favorite radio station out of buffalo n.Y. that's when it was confirmed. the radio station got an onslaught of phone calls citing the sighting. the d.J. was a little ticked and confirmed it was a ufo and told the listeners to stop calling in.

when i observed it, after my eyes glazed over, i took my focus off the craft & looked at it various times. i didn't know what it was going to do, hoping it would, but nothing happened.

after gazing at it, i felt it must be a ufo because there was nothing about its character that looked or acted like anything i'd seen in my 18 years on earth.

i went back inside, listened to music, ate lunch, went back outside and it was gone.
content.summary: Silver barrel shaped craft. radio dj acknowledged craft. said not to call in...

content.detailedDescription: Hello again i think i might have seen a time traveler i did report a glowing sighting not to long ago and someone called and spoke with me thank you for that im not sure but something strange is happening i dropped my brother at the gym when i got out on the main road a ripple or something like that appeared on the road and a white station wagon like a 70 model was in this window of a ripple when i saw the vehicle pop in the ripple i actually tried to accelerate to catch up and get in the space that opened up its really hard to write about what i saw but i am very sure i saw something happen in a fabric of time or something please understand im quite sure im not losing my mind the ripple looked like when you open an oven door and you see the waves from the heat there was things happening around the ripple wave window space or whatever it is called i am not sure what to say or do about this again thank you for your time phil.
content.summary: I think i saw a time traveler

content.detailedDescription:
my brother stays next door to me with my father. he is staying with me tonight, so we walked over to our fathers house to get him so clothes. while walking next door i happen to look up and see what looks like what would be a helicopter falling straight from the sky to the ground.                                                                                  
    i told my brother devin to look to make sure that i was really seeing what i thought i was. i said "do you see that helicopter falling?", but as soon as i said that it seemed to go straight back up the way that it was just falling down. what initally had made me think that it was a helicopter was the blue light that was blinkning. i noticed that it wasnt blinking uncontrollably. it seemed to not have a certain pattern, also it moved up and down back and forth side to side and diagnally, and the most austonashing thing was how fast it moved and the way the light seemed to blink all the way around it like it was a ball or a spherical ufo that you would see on t.V. 
    after about30-35 min of watching this dancing blinking light out of no where i hear my brother devin shout my name, "kirston look", i turned to look and as soon as i did i seen what looked to be a white or silver spaceship that had an blinking orange pulsating bright light that seemed to be going towards the other unknown aircraft, but as soon as it got over the top of some trees thats where it seemed to land, out of sight behind the trees across the road from my house. 
    after the space ship was out of sight thats when i turned my attention back to what i believed to be an ufo. now not only the round one with the blue and white blinking lights i now saw a right slightly smaller and dimmer version of the 1st ufo i saw earlier tonight. while i was looking all i could do was stand frozen with fear of what might happen next. im thinknig are these aircrafts goning to fight these ships or are they goin to join together to destroy us?, all these and more horrific thoughts ran threw my mind as if all at once. this started at 10:00pm october 13th, it is now 3:00am october 14th the blue and white ufo is still close to the red one but still has not come in contact with each other, although at times the blue one gets close but as soon as it get close enough it shoots back up farther away towards the sky and the small red one blinks and hovers in the same space slowly following the bigger blue one.
content.summary: One seem to land earlier after that two seemed to become closer and closer but still have not met. my brother and i are still watching these two balls of blinking lights; the balls of blinking lihgts are so far away it is hard to make out their shapes

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the parking lot of the williston, north dakota city library around 1:30 a.M.  looking out to the sw side of williston, nd., i observed 4 exact size bright orange/amber lights ascending from out of the west/southwest in a graduated flight pattern/trajectory. the first of two orange lights appeared to have an ascending pattern of about 60 degrees flying southeast at slower speeds for about a half mile, then it came to a dead stop in mid air, then the light ascended south at a much higher elevation and vanished within seconds.  i couldn't believe my eyes and was about to brush it off. however, i looked back in the direction where the light first appeared and there was another(2nd)light following the same flight pattern. watching intensely, the same exact thing took place with this light as with the first light. the speed at which these lights ascended higher and vanishing within seconds is indescribable. 
   
even more astonished, i looked back in the direction from where these first two lights came from and there where 2 more of these bright orange/amber lights( one following the other at a very close range)in the same flight pattern as the first two.  the thing that was different with these two lights is that they came to a stop in almost the same spot( if you will ) as the first two lights, came to a dead stop, side-by-side, then ascended together in the same trajectory/pattern as the first two lights and vanished w/n seconds.

after these events i was trying to think of any airfield in the vicinity of these lights, which none are known of. and i thought possibly it was military aircraft.  however after investigating what type of aircraft have orange/amber lights (only!), come to find out, there are none. these were all very large bright solid orange/amber lights.  they were not a beacon nor did any of them have a blinking sequence.
content.summary: 2 orange lights ascended separately but symmetrically. 2 others ascended together symmetrically. all vanished in seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work, we worked in courtland ca. for safeway packing as scab forklift drivers, as i said i were driving to work for about fifteen minutes when the guy in the passenger seat said i don't know if any of you have noticed but this cloud has been in front of us since we left lodi and there isn't another cloud in the sky, i looked and said hey, maybe there's a spaceship hiding behind it, and someone from the back said yeah with little green men in it, everyone started laughing when this ship started to come out of the left side of the cloud i slammed on my brakes and stopped put it in park and shut off the engine while staring at it, got out of the car and started walking toward it to get a better look at it, i could hear everyone screaming profanities at me to get back in the car or they were going to leave me, but i had the keys in my hand, i was looking for anything i could see, but there was nothing, no windows, no doors, no seams, nothing, i don't remember seeing a moon, but there were a lot of stars out in the back ground, i remember looking and there were no other clouds in the sky. then the ship moved back behind the cloud and within seconds the cloud disintegrated and there was nothing, i got in and drove to work with everyone yammering like little school boys, at lunch it's all we could talk about, when we got home we called the airforce to report it to project bluebook, they said there was no project bluebook and took our report, they said they had 500 other calls about the sighting, and that it was a weather balloon in the area. this was no weather balloon.
content.summary: Craft came out of cloud, hovered, went back into cloud, disintegrated.

content.detailedDescription: I grew up seeing them up close and far away at night and day light i grew up in the country seeing them , i even lost alot of what i seen , even nixen and the army came there .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen a number of them

content.detailedDescription: See through person/animal thing human and human like person with a ball of light no neck with tiny little lights all over its body from shoulder down and maybe animal things one with goggle eyes only the other one coke bottle lens and third black face round with white eyes and dot for node or mouth saw the king with cloke gown with high colar with pointed head normal face that i could see talking to the 3 people looking things the ball of light guy with all the tiny little lights all over its body a window looking light up eyes or face with human bodyish and i forget the third person looking thing but my first encounter was what i call stinger has a light up face and eyes current triangle looking had a solid mouth hi macleod looking mouth had it solid middle with outer on both sides lit up and on the right side had a solid mouse comics crab lookin mouth has it solid middle with outer sides lit up solid digestive system it looked like waist-high i could see waist down all black can't see well like tentacle looking things and believe it or not i fed it food and he would fly and hover he took food out of my hand or she and saw a lot of a little bearden creatures scared the hell out of me at first the average human every single day and every single night 24/7 just like i still do would like to talk to somebody about this please
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have seen them for quite a while now still from 1998 to now 2015

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my younger brother witnesses a object as big as a football stadium or possible blimp. it made no noise and moved about 3-5 miles an hour twice as high as treetop level. it happened the day skylab went up. everybody said it was the skylab heat shield. no at 3-5 miles per hour it was no heat shield. i wonder if anybody else saw it?
my dad caught it at the last second but it was too far away.

thanks.
paul
content.summary: It looked like a bowl flying with a grid under it,  and blinking lights. very large, no sound.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I have video and other images as well of the event. i do not wish to post a written disclosure of the event other than to say that the images tell the story. i thought i was looking at venus on the horizon until i put my sony cybershot with a 55mm lens and a 50mm zoom brought the image along with other images to my eyesight. it was at this time that i realized that something very peculiar was happening and i filmed the event for as long as it was visible to me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Unique but i'd seen similar activity in my lifetime here in the same skies.

content.detailedDescription:
silver  metal round shape with  top  and bottom same  dome   
   shape  on top  and  bottom with  flat sides that  had  bright white round  lights that were  seen  in  broad  daylight  the lights  were  rotating   chaser  lights. my best  friend  and  i  were  driving home  from  meeting  boyfriends .We turned  the  corner  and  it  was  just there above us   i rolled  down  my  window  stuck  my  head  out  and  told  her  to  stop . the  object  disappeared straight  up and  was  gone  instantly. she floored  it  and  drove  to  nearest  store where  we  parked  and  tried  to justify  what  we  saw. we  went  directly  to my  home  which was  ten  minutes  away told  my  sister she  blew  us off .So we  told  her  parents  about  it  a  few months  later  they also  made fun  of  us .We  finally  stopped talking  about it  until  about 1998 when i  asked if  she  ever  told  anyone  she  says  she  did  once  when a  co worker  mentioned  a  similar  experience  around  the  same  time.
content.summary: Appeared  out  of  nowhere  just  above  our  car  hovered  then  disappeared  as  quick  as  it appeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: This by far is the craziest thing i have ever witnessed in my life and still makes me tear up or get chills everyone i talk about it. i'm on tv for a show that my girlfriend is on and i'am very sane. i've witnessed this same exact event twice in my life in two different states. i'm from a chicago suburb where i first witnessed this. me and my ex gf got home around 3am about 9years ago(sober). we got out of the car and i told her there was a satalite in the sky mount slowly. it looked like a star moving slowly through the sky. we watched for a few minutes and all of a sudden it stopped completely. then got brighter and brighter and brighter. it became so bright that i could see my shadow on the ground. it was right under some low clouds i'm guessing a few hundred feet off the ground. it was a large bright orb with two different bright white lights. the lights above the orb were not as bright as the bottom lights. then the amazing part happened.. it zipped miles and miles to the left and the zipped back past where it started miles and miles and did the same thing 3 or 4 times making this splitting threw the air noise. it then stopped perfectly where it was when it stopped. it stayed there when i called the non emergency number and she said there was more calls about it. it then zipped off into the sky like star trek when they beam into light speed. it left such a long white trail that like fell and faded as time went. it was so long.. i couldn't sleep that night and have been telling everyone this story for years. just recently i seen the same exact thing in broad day light. almost identical except it didn't zip into space it disappeared behind some clouds slowly as i tried to grab my current girlfriend that i'm on the tv show with. except now i live at the top of the west hollywood hills in ca. i'm one of the very top houses and this time it happened it day light on oct 7th 2015. i'm willing to take a lie detector test or whatever i need to do. this is some technolog we have that no one knows about or completely a ufo. craziest thing i have ever seen in my whole life. i'm 30 and completely normal and not crazy.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Alien or government

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was working at a local tennis club and pool around 21:00.  i had finished my work and was lounging around the pool waiting for the sprinklers to finish watering the clay tennis courts.  i was facing east and observed, what appeared to be, a pink meteor falling from the northeast to the east at about a 25 degree angle of descent.  it was unusual because the color was the same pink with no variations in brightness.  it fell below the horizon.  shortly thereafter i observed what i originally thought was a plane rising from the last spot i saw the meteor, the area is close to a regional airport.  the object was coming directly towards the pool.  the object appeared to be triangular.  since i wanted to get a closer look i scaled the large diving board.  i got to the top of the board and noticed the black object was hovering.  i also observed three lights pulsing on the bottom close to the corners of the object.  at that point a rush of fear fell upon me and i ran down the ladder to the swimming pool and proceeded towards the pump room.  as i looked back i observed the object vertically leave at a high rate of speed without any sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw pink meteor falling from sky.  shortly thereafter had an encounter with black delta wing with pulsating lights on the bottom of object.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were hunting gophers which are crop eaters. it was a warm summer day so i stretched out in the pasture. i was shocked to see this very large bird about 25 feet above my head. i was kind of confused because the bird did not move or flutter at all. after a few minutes i took a shot at it with .22 rifle. nothing happened. so i shot 15 rounds, and the "bird" did not move except to move slightly higher. 

    this went on for about 20 minutes. the "bird" finally went out or sight directly overhead. i'm sure i hit this so called bird many times.Three years after this episode i was rated the best shot in my regiment during the korean conflict.
content.summary: We were hunting, and we shot at this stationary bird for about 20 minutes, and it did not move except to very slowly rise.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting out on patio on oct. 5 2015 talking with my neighbor. it was a nice evening, and around 1:30 to 2:00 am. there has been heavy bigfoot activity in the area. my neighbor started to say, "whats that?" when i saw it. up in the sky an oblong craft...Up and down...Not across..It was coming straight down, not angled. it looked smooth bright white with a neon green haze around it. my neighbor saw it longer than i and said there were flames out the back. it just came straight down most likely landing in a farmers field across the street. it went out of view due to the home in front of us about 20 feet away. we did not go check for landing area, as we do not have any equipment to read radiation levels.The next day, both if us in our own separate homes, slept for an unusually long time and felt exhausted the entire next day. both of us were confused and kept asking each other if what we just saw was real. i felt especially off...Strange...And out of it. so much so that my neighbor questioned if more had happened to me that i wasnt telling him. as far as i know...Nothing did. i just felt exhausted and really off through the following day.
content.summary: Saw a bright white oblong craft with a green outer glow fall straight down from the sky...No angles. there are also sasquatch in the direct area. was with another witness when it happened...He claimed to see fire toward the rear of the craft.

content.detailedDescription: My family and my friends family were camping on caribou mountain outside of nederland colorado. we were towards the top of the mountain just below the snow cap. we were drinking hot chocolate and making smores for the kids around the campfire when my buddy jason suddenly turned and said "what the hell is that?" as i turned the direction he was looking, i observed a glowing object rising out of the mountains going strait up. i instantly tried to determine what this object was, but when it stopped just above the mountain tops and started pulsing different colors(red,blue,green,orange,yellow)i didn't know what i was seeing. everybody was mesmerized and all camping activities stopped as we watched the object meander its way higher and higher in the sky until it was over our heads almost strait above us at an unknown altitude. then it stopped, started hovering and the colored pulsing became faster and brighter. then red lights began to emerge from the main object lining up in formation to the left and right of the main object. if memory serves right, about 8 to 10 red objects. as the main object remained stationary and continuing to pulse the rainbow colors, the red objects began to dart about the sky in ways i've never seen any aircraft move. some seemed to be chasing each other, some seemed to go off by themselves flying erratically. they were making hard right angle turns without slowing down, they were going one direction and instantly going 180 degrees the other way. it seemed as if they were playing like children in the playground running around their mother. everyone at our camp was trying to take pictures with their cell phones, but nothing seemed to turn out very good. cell phones weren't that good back then. the only thing we had to see these things better was a pair of binoculars, which we all shared trying to get a better look. this event went on for hours. eventually the red objects returned to formation next to the main object and one by one went back into the main object, exactly as they came out. the main objects light pulses slowed and it began to descend. it descended down to the mountain we were on, and went just behind the top of the peak. i could still see the light pulsing around the mountain top. i had the binoculars and began to walk up and around the mountain toward the light. everyone was saying "what are you doing? don't go over there dennis!!" the kids were scared and thought we were going to be abducted, and hid in their tents. i admit i was scared to death too, but the curiosity i felt was overwhelming, i had to see what this thing was. as i rounded the mountain, the object was still there hovering, i stopped and tried to get a look through the binoculars. as i was focusing in, i could see the hull of the craft through the glow, there were no lights that i could see, it was as if the hull itself was glowing. it was silent, no sound at all.I was now within 50 foot of this thing. as i inched closer and closer, every hair on my body began to stand on end. then the object moved further around the mountain just out of my view, and my hair laid back down. i walked a little further bringing the object back in view, my hair stood back up and then suddenly the craft came directly toward me and flew right over my head within 20ft. or so. that scared the crap out of me and i screamed out loud as the object passed over me without a sound. it sped away at incredible speed, disappearing behind the mountains. oddly, the next thing i remember is standing next to the camp fire, everyone sleeping in their tents, and the sun coming up. i climbed into my tent and went to sleep. i don't know what happened, i wont say i was taken because i don't know. the eight of us spoke about it a few times since then, but were scoffed at and laughed at like we were all crazy. eventually we just stopped talking about it. one thing is for sure, what we saw that night changed my life forever, as i'm sure the same goes for everyone that was there. although i don't have any evidence of our encounter, i think about it every single day. i look to the sky a lot more than i used to. i do have nightmares about things that are hard to admit, but its just something i've learned to live with. it felt good to write all this out and share with you guys after not talking about it for so long.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Observed object rising out of mountains. several red objects came out of the main object, flew around for hours then went back into the main object. main object descended back down to mountain top level.

content.detailedDescription:
A huge light suddenly appeared while driving 3 friends home from bingo. it lit the whole car up like daylight. it was like staring at a photo flash bulb but larger. i thought it was an airplane that was going to hit us. suddenly it withdrew and in its wake left a few sparks. it scared me and my friends until one of them said that was probably a falling star and that happened all the time.  it was hard for me to accept but i grew up in illinois not southeast arizona. we never  spoke of the event later. the light appeared out of nowhere and was the brightest light i have ever seen.  this is not the first strange appearance of light but it was the closest.  the program you are broadcasting was about the schilling family.  that is my maiden name.  i don't talk about this episode at all. people laugh if you say it might have been a ufo so i just say it was a meteorite.  

the other light event i saw was in 1983 and my late husband and i had just turned onto highway m89 between lake doster and august, michigan.  just two twin lights that appeared up in the dark sky suddenly dipping and then going in a half circle before flying up into the air and just disappearing.
content.summary: A daylight bright light lighting up my whole car.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home in my mother's red truck on the main road that my home is on. i got within a mile of being home when i see a blinding light in my rearview mirror. this light wasn't be another car on the road bc i was the only one on the road that the time. the light followed me for about an half of a mile before disappearing. when i got home and told my mother about it, she then tells me that she two many years ago she too has been followed by lights in the sky. i never saw the object that made the light that followed. but it's not the first time that i have seen an ufo and my mother also has more stories as while.
content.summary: I was followed home one night by a blinding light over head. this isn't my first i have been visited.

content.detailedDescription: 1993 april, rainbow valley az latitude: n 33 18' 34.6824''     longtitude   w 112   31.821113'

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was 18 at the time, living in brooklyn ny. i was leaning on the stop sign pole on the corner of 12ave, & 43rd. street it was between 3am & 3:30am i was talking to a girl that couldn't be seen because she was sitting on a step in the doorway of the building. i never looked her way at the time because i couldn't believe what i was seeing. there was a very large ufo, the kind that people normally see, the round dish with a dome in the center with lights going around the lower part of it, there was three colors but i could only remember the two that i mentioned. it was a bit into the block on 43rd. street not in the center of the two streets. it was almost as wide as the two buildings were on either side of the street. it made no sound it was just hovering and i sure as heck knew something was looking at me i felt it big time and i couldn't stop looking at it. as i said i just kept on talking to the girl and when i felt i could stop looking at it i waved for the girl to come look at it but before she took a step it took off in a downward direction headed towards 42nd. street and it was gone. i have no idea where it could of went but it was gone. i truly feel it would of tried to take me away if i hadn't waved for the girl to look. back then in the 60's i was a weight lifter and a tough guy but it scared the crap out of me, i told the girl to go in and i went up to my apartment. i can not remember anything after i told her to go in, its all a blank.
content.summary: Brooklyn 1967

content.detailedDescription: The first ufo i saw was disk shap we had a small dog it started to bark so i. let him out as i was hooking him up he started to harwall it turn around and   i saw the disk shap object i went in the house and told my mother and father  to look out the window it sat there for 20 min to a half hour and it took off in a zig zag  and then it went straight up the second one i saw i was in worcester going home it was about 230 in the morning i was on 290 hedding home i had my son with me he said to me what is that i told him it is a ufo.  it was traveling right aside of me i told my son to buckle up i am going to try something so i speeded up it speeded up i hit the bracks it did the same thing i did all the way down the hyway igot down by the mass like it did a flip it happens so fast i did a single take and i said to my son what just happened and went to new york
content.summary: I saw 2 ufos in my life time the first one i was 18 years old the #2 i saw at the age of 38

content.detailedDescription: At 8:15pm was listening to music while in back yard suddenly could only get static then flash of light. i looked up and a round disc was going zig zags above viewed for a few minutes then took straight path across hill.
content.summary: Listening to music on cell phone got static then saw a flash looked up it was zig zagging above me then took off

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
my cousin had moved to louisiana, from california. i road with him to get the last of his belongings from california. we had drive what seemed like forever. we were on the desert hwy headed to into california, and we started seeing search lights east of the hwy. we were on lots of them. i guess when entering into california you stop at a check point. my cousin had been through this a lot of times, i've never heard of it. he made th comment how diserted it was as we pulled up at the checkpoint, one was open with a man standing there with no expression on his face, was just going to wave us through. i leaned across from the passenger side, and asked about all the search lights off to the east. he looking at me never raised his eyes to see what i was asking about, like you could miss them anyway? and simpley said what search lights. we drove off. 
     we are driving maybe 5 mins. and it hits the fan there are 40 to 50 maybe more crafts like i've never seen all different shapes and sizes, moving in every direction seemed to me that they were looking for somthing. then we see it a small craft lights still working blinking, rotating no noise though it had crashed dug in the dirt nose first, it was i guess egg shaped ???? i told my cousin to pull over he did reluctantly. i got out and started back down the east side of 4 ln. hwy with a median where the craft had come to rest. then i came to my right mind, the crafts were all around the crash site still looking for somthing. 
so i turned and started back to our car. at a good jog speed, out of the dark in the median of the hwy. this i don't know how to describe it humanoid i guess, comes shuffling with it's arms outstretched to me, i remember it seemed for some reason to me to be adolescent it was 10 to 15ft. away from me and i'm sure looked as afraid as i know i was. 
    it shuffled out into the pavement still coming toward me as if it expected me to protect it, all of the sudden a very non- discriped black car with what i could tell 2 men in it wizzes by from out of nowhere and hit this, thing never even tried to stop or avoid it. in my opinion. 
i turned and now at full run headed back to car and cousin who was now at this point fit to be tied. 
      now this huge craft triangle shaped covered both sides of hwy. it looked like the night sky lights that looked like stars in the night sky descended down 50 ft. directly over our moving car and stayed over us even if we slowed down or speed up it stayed right on top of us. made a light buzzing sound was all the noise it made. and i don't know how to explain it but smelled like a fuel but no fuel smell i've ever smelled before or after. 
    and now i'm thinking it's occupants in the big craft are thinking i had killed the crashed being i also noticed there are no other cars except us on eather side of hwy. 
  there is lots more but i feel silly telling the whole thing i've told a few people and always been laught at. but swear it's true and goes on longer than where i stopped just have kept it to myself along time but i see why others look at me like i've lost my mind.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: The main craft was triangle black whitch was like the night sky. but there were lots and lots of them

content.detailedDescription: Me and a few friends were sitting in the yard by a fire pit . it was a clear night mostly so i was showing them satellites in the sky since none of them had ever seen one before so they were really interested . at about 10 pm one guy left and another went to pick up his daughter. so me and another guy were talking when i saw a big flash above us like a photograph being taken almost . so i said to my friend what the hell was that and so we were both watching the sky when it happened again and again about 30 to 40 second in between flashes you could never see the object unless it gave off the flash of light which would last for a few seconds and then disappear . the light looked circular and would expand a bit disappear and show up in a different spot but still very close to original spot not in a straight line random all over the place . this happened 14 times that i remember . twice the light was yellowish and once i could see it was emitting some kind of gas or emitting something on the side or back looked like a wind blown cloud that was the same color as the light. after the 14th flash a commercial plane was flying underneath and we never saw any more flashes after that . we tried to take video with cellphone but never got it because it would move and you couldn't see it until it flashed. my feelings are that we saw a ufo . we looked for another hour but never saw anything after that .
content.summary: Flashes of light appearing overhead changed color and moved around

content.detailedDescription: On september 23rd 2015 at approximately 8 pm during a neighborhood walk at dusk i looked up and was startled to see 4 large orange star like balls moving across the sky. it was alarming because they were very large and at a low elevation and 4 of them moving in a row. there were no stars in the sky because it wasn't dark yet.There were also at least 2 planes in the sky at the same time at higher elevations with easily identifiable blinking lights.The orange balls of light seemed to be following each other but not in a straight line horizontally across the sky. they were so abnormal and close that i took cover under a nearby tree to observe them not wanting to keep walking toward them out in the open because i was afraid. as i watched the first orange ball of light ascended straight up into the atmosphere out of sight and then the 2nd and the third and the fourth like they were following each other.No one else was walking on the street to see but cars were going by. i was thinking that the planes must have seen them but i don't know they were flying so much lower to the ground than the planes. afterward i felt disturbed and worried about what they were.
content.summary: At dusk observed 4 large star like orange balls following each other across the sky then each one following the other ascended up until out of sight

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were sitting in a swing facing south east, around dusk sun had just set, still good light. a bright light appeared se, a jet or helicopter, it appeared stationary for several minutes then began to move toward us(my sister and myself) from about 1/2 to 1 mile away. before it got directly above us, 3 reddish pink lights appeared in a teiangle shape around horizontally  the bright white light. when got almost directly above us the red lights began to  girate or orbit randomly around the bright light staying in triangle pattern. when directly abovely us a green light appeared above the bright light but with the triangle of red lights. it hovered silently above us about 3 to 4 minutes, then moved silently to nw red lights orbiting randomly, all movement from beginning to end in straight line. while it happened we asked each other if we could believe what we were seeing. wowed us. my sister does not like to talk about it in front of people. i tell it as described to many, i saw a ufo.
content.summary: Bright light in se, stationary, then moved toward us, before directly above us three lights in triangle shape appear,  hovered dircpectly above then moved mw, silent.

content.detailedDescription: A roommate and i wofked at will rogers airport at the time, i had to be clocked in at 4:30 am and as we drove to work, we usully listen to the radio but not that morning. we drove with the windows down and no radio so it completly silent during the trip. once we reached air cargo rd, just north of the f.A.A, we noticed a round object lower from the fog, the botton had red and blue lights that flashed for a few minutes then it shot straight up, causing the fog to follow it from underneath. the incident took about 5-10 minutes, and afterwards, we looked at each other to make sure that we both witnessed the same thing and then drove as fast as we could to the airport. once there, we mentioned it a few co-workers but nobody else had seen it. i understand it was a long time ago but watching your show tonight made me realize, we are not alone and i am very thankful neither my friend or myself was not harmed. we kept trying to pass it off as a helicopter or little plane but there was no sound, complete silence as it hovered down and lifted off. the year it happend is not certain but i do know it was between the years of 1989-1994, the years that we obtained employment there. i also understand this may not be much to work on but, at least our story(sighting) is known. thank you for all your hard work and effort to prove, we are not alone!
content.summary: Came down on a foggy morning, saw the lights with no sound, then shot straight up and made the fog follow underneath

content.detailedDescription: we were camping out at enchanted rock in central texas. we were on top of the rock with a telescope looking at the stars.  we noticed a craft streaking toward the ground. it was about a mile away and stopped and hovered about 50 to 75 feet above the ground. its lights were flashing and the craft was turning and we were able to look at it through the telescope for a brief time. it stayed visible for several minutes then it streeked off in the same direction it had come from. several minutes later it returned to the same location it had been hovering at. then it streaked off and disappeared.  it was amazing how fast it moved. we believe there was a report in the news paper in fredericksburg several days later that a person had discovered in their travel home that they had lost a period of time and thought possibly they had been abducted.  i'm not sure of the exact date the incident took place but it was in the summer of 1975.  there were five or six of us in our group camping out that night. we still talk about it sometimes and are still amazed at what we saw. i got a real good look at the craft through the telescope but it was moving left and right, turning and flashing its flights.  it was definitely something not of this world.  we were all stunned and could not believe what we had just witnessed but having the telescope gave us a really good look at it.  it was definitely a saucer shaped object. we could see it's  body along with the lights because of the telescope.  it appeared to be 12 to 15 feet in diameter and possibly 8 to 10 feet tall. it appeared to have at least three different colored lights and although it was moving left to right it was also spinning.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: we saw it streak in. it moved back-and-forth while blinking lights were on. if streaked off then it returned. however for several seconds straight off again.
